remarks: Define set of all projective automorphisms.  This is the intended definition of automorphism in [Crawley] p. 112.  (Contributed by NM, 26-Jan-2012.)
statement:
df-pautN $p |- PAut = ( k e. _V |-> { f | ( f : ( PSubSp ` k ) -1-1-onto-> ( PSubSp ` k ) /\ A. x e. ( PSubSp ` k ) A. y e. ( PSubSp ` k ) ( x C_ y <-> ( f ` x ) C_ ( f ` y ) ) ) } ) $.
$d f k x y $.
